diskSpace.description: Amount of disk space to allocate to the server in gigibytes (Gi) (1Gi = 1024Mi)

modrinthProjects.description: List of modrinth project short names (Example - from https://modrinth.com/mod/pixelmon the short name is pixelmon)

spigotPluginIds.description: List of spigot resource ids (Example - from https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/luckperms.28140 the resource id is 28140) (default plugins in order: LuckPerms, Vault, Chunky, HuskHomes, ChunkyBorder, Plugin Portal)

worldUrl.description: URL to download the world from, must be a direct link to a zip archive
